name: Fairy Hair Rescue
description:
Princess Teal has a problem. You see, she has just awoken from deep, 100-year old slumber, and her hair is an absolute mess. Lucky for her, there are three magical fairies, whose everyday job is to help sleepy princesses in need.

How to play:
Click on the respective fairy and try to detangle mighty 100 metres of hair!
You can choose between:

  • Shampoo, who will clean and rinse off old bubblegum remains (and no, we don't know how those came to be),
  • Sailor Swift, who is good at solving tricy knots, and,
  • Trimmy, who will snap off all those pesky split ends.

Help the princess on her journey back to luxurious curls!

Credits:
Programming: J-F Baraton
Art: I.O. Battle
Sounds: freesound.org/people/MattLeschuck, freesound.org/people/bolkmar
